resources.string: Position of buttons on the screen
Dont show POI icons on the map
Turn map on the northern direction
Turn the map in driving direction
Set this zoom level at long press on minus button
Set this zoom level at long press on plus button
Show blue disk indicator like Google Map
Screen will be automatically turned off in case of inactivity
Screen will not be turned off while you see map
Hide window title with map name and etc
Hide status bar in map mode
Switch off check of the size and datetime map files
Slow updating saves the battery theoretically
Used for temp storage map tiles. Size: %dKB/4MB
Tiles index of offline maps. Size: %dKB
Show scale bar at left bottom corner
On this zoom traffic info are unavailable
Data on SD card is not available. Operation cannot be performed.

The source site of VFR, IFR High, IFR Low charts is unavailable now. Read here about it. http://blog.runwayfinder.com/
 
 v.0.8.7.3
 - Bug fix
 
 v.0.8.7
 + New preference Directory
 + Now RMaps stores tiles of online maps on sdcard in sqlite format
 
 v.0.8.6.1
 - Bug fix
 
 v.0.8.6
 + New maps: VFR (avcharts.com), MyTopo, OSM MTB Mapa Česká republika
 + Error report (please, send me message about force close)
 - Bug fix: Mutlitouch, Scale bar, more
 
 v.0.8.5
 + Scale bar, Units property
 
 v.0.8.4.1
 - Bug fix: Force close on Android 1.5-1.6
 
 v.0.8.4
 - Mutlitouch zooming
 + Zoom buttons settings: top, bottom, hide
 
 v.0.8.3.2
 + Ready to install to SD card
 + Update maps URL
 - Bug fix: Force close on Stop trackwriter on Froyo
 - Bug fix: Wrong date time on tracks. New tracks will be OK
 
 v.0.8.3
 + Export track to GPX, KML file
 
 v.0.8.2
 + Drawing of a current written track
 
 v.0.8.1
 + Track writer
 + Integration with Radar programs
 + New maps for USA aviators: VFR Chart, IFR Low, IFR High
 
 v.0.8.0
 + Import tracks from KML, GPX files
 
 v.0.7.7.1
 - Bug fix: Import some poi files
 + Delete all poi confirm dialog
 
 v.0.7.7
 + Import POI from KML, GPX files
 + Optimisation of drawing of POI
 + Update Yandex.Map URL, Google.Map URL
 
 v.0.7.6
 + Add localisation of Google Maps. See Preference
 + Added new online maps (Topographic map of Norway, Sea map of Norway)
 + Add screen orientation preference
 + Update Yandex.Map URL, Google.Map URL
 
 v.0.7.5
 + POI category
 + The back button close the search result window
 - Bug fix: OS Map
 
 v.0.7.4
 + Added new online maps (Docelu.pl Poland, Freemap.sk Slovakia, Slovakia Hiking, Slovakia Hiking HillShade)
 Do you want to add new online map? Write to me.
 
 v.0.7.3
 - Bug fix: 100 value zoom in sqlitedb format maps
 + Added new online maps (Microsoft Maps, Maps China, Virtual Earth, Hybrid, OSM Hiking Germany, OSM Public Transport, Outdooractive.com, Cykloatlas CZ, UMP-pcPL Poland)
 
 v.0.7.0
 + Minimum POI functionality
 + Integration with GPS Status by Rudolf Hornig
 + Move index data of offline maps to sdcard
 + Added buttons for clearing internal cache and index database to preference
 + Update Yandex.Map URL, Google.Map URL
 - Bug fix: Wrong compass orientation on landscape mode

After the last start the software problem has forced RMaps to be closed unexpectedly. Please, send the error report to the author of the program. Click Generate report, you can read the message before it is sent.
